goal.name: cactus:cactifywar
goal.description: Creates a Cactus-ready war from the application war (depends on war:war).

goal.name: cactus:test
goal.description: Run the Cactus tests on the containers for which you have defined a cactus.home.[container name] property.

goal.name: cactus:single
goal.description: Run a single Cactus test on the containers for which you have defined a cactus.home.[container name] property. Pass the name of the testcase in using -Dtestcase=my.single.TestCase.

goal.name: cactus:match
goal.description: Run all Cactus tests that match a property -Dtestmatch=MyTestCase on the containers for which you have defined a cactus.home.[container name] property.

goal.name: cactus:report
goal.description:
Generate an HTML report for the Cactus tests that been run. In order to get this report as part of the generated web site, add the following to your project.xml:
<reports> [...] <report>maven-cactus-plugin</report> [...] </reports>

goal.name: cactus:jar
goal.description: Generate a jar containing the Cactus test classes.

goal.name: cactus:jar-install
goal.description: Installs the Cactus jar in your local Maven repository. This is useful if you wish to put Cactus test classes in one Maven project and execute the Cactus tests in another Maven project.
